title: Google Stadia teases support for ‘unmodified’ Windows games, potentially a huge library boost
content:
Stadia has had a rough run so far, related in large part to a lack of compelling games in its library. Now, it seems Google is ready to remove a roadblock to bringing games to Stadia, with support for “unmodified” Windows titles on the cloud gaming platform.

more…

The post Google Stadia teases support for ‘unmodified’ Windows games, potentially a huge library boost appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: With more details to come at a developer-focused event, Google is teasing support for "unmodified" Windows games on Stadia.
